description:
As Colin i would like to handle time on cards so that i dont have to go to the project manager and update him or always go to the time reporting tool to time report so that it will make my and other peoples day more efficient. It will also keep the project manager more frequently updated on the progress.


Estimate 
..............
* You should be able to time estimate on a card level
* If there is estimates on a card the value on the activity should be a summarized value from all cards connected to that activity, otherwise it should show the value set on the activity
* You should only be able to estimate if the card belongs to an activity

Remaining work
.........................
* You should be able to set remaining work on a card
* If there is remaining work on a card the value on the activity should be a summarized value from all cards connected to that activity, otherwise it should show the value set on the activity
* You should only be able to use remaining work if the card belongs to an activity


Time reporting
.......................
* Everyone will still be able to time report in the time reporting tool
* Time reporting on a card would mean time reporting on the activity but we need to show how much reported is on the actual card as well on the activity - show this is details pane on board for the card and and in activity swim lane for the activity
* Time reporting on a card could be by adding reported time in an input field connected to the summary of the time reported
* This would mean its possible to both time report on an activity (as of today) in the reporting tool but also on cards that are connected to an activity
* You should not be able to report time on cards that are not connected to an activity
* Reported time on cards connected to an activity and reported time on the activity should be summaries as one value to be shown everywhere as a total sum in the service for that activity

Alerts and summary
..................
* Indicate alerts on the activity in the board view the same way as on an activity (overrun, overdue, might overrun, estimates exceeds parent original estimate)
* If you have started using remaining work or estimates on cards in the board you should get informative warnings about "2/5 card has been estimated”
*This means warn in the same way as in the plan (only on activities)This
title: Time on Cards

description:
Michael Siebke has posted a new idea "Option to hide columns in plan view".

You may view the details at http://ideas.projectplace.com/feedbacks/153063-option-hide-columns-plan-view

In plan view, by default the columns 'Duration', 'Start date', 'End date', 'Estimated', 'Reported' and 'Remaining' are displayed.
We don't used time bookings to the last three columns 'Estimated', 'Reported' and 'Remaining' are just white space occupying screen width. It seems to be an option to move the vertical bar between the left side columns and the Gantt view to the left but this will cause the first column with activity names getting useless small (cutting activity names are hiding them at all).
The best solution would be to provide an option to hide columns in plan view to get more space for what is important. Another option would be to set a minimum width for the name column to that moving the vertical bar can be used to hide columns starting from the last one.

Related idea:
http://ideas.projectplace.com/feedbacks/153093-remove-hide-unsused-plan-tab-columns

 "Remove/hide unsused Plan tab columns".
Remove or hide the plan tab columns eg Estimated, Remaining, Duration etc which are unused so full activity descriptions and plan bars can be seen.
Plan activity description get compressed so you cannot see the bars and the descriptions together on one screen
title: 160728 "Option to hide columns in plan view"

description:
REOPENING 2018-01-17
Generic error message generates support requests every day.

Error message when user does not have access is the same as when an actual error occurs ("An error has occurred. If the error remains, please contact Projectplace Support.).
Would it be possible to have a specific error message for when a user clicks link to object they have no access to? (usually it's a file or folder, example: https://service.projectplace.com/pp/pp.cgi/r1386538182) 

___________________________________________

If a user clicks a link to an item in a project and he/she has no access, they get an error message asking them to contact support.

Is there any reason why we do not ask them to contact the project administrator directly due to lack of access?

The current set-up seems to lead to waste on both sides.
title: CC: Generic error message when no access

description:
Reported by: Michael Stamper
michael_stamper@mentor.com
EE Account: Mentor Graphics 1031749667
KID: 145356

It only requires 2 clicks to delete an activity in the Plan, and there is no option to restore the activity.
Our warning message does inform about this, but in this case a user has accidentally deleted an activity that had hundreds of subactivities.

Being aware that it is their own responsibility, the users are still surprised and unhappy that there is no possibility to back up or restore the plan.
If he exports the plan to a local copy, it can not be imported back into PP.
User wishes possibility to either:
restore deleted activity from Recycle Bin
or 
undo/ctrl-z actions
or
reset plan to some point in time
or
import exported Plan. 

Steps to reproduce
1. In Plan, click delete
2. Click delete on warning that pops up
3. Realize that activity is gone.

idea: http://ideas.projectplace.com/feedbacks/133249-backup-plan
title: CC: Plan - No possibility to undo or restore activity if deleting by mistake

What : Being able to reorganize the columns in oder to put most important columns at the right and less important at the left.
Why : Some columns are more important than others. For example we added a KPI "Previsional Hours in 2107". It is less important for us than "Next milestone date". So that "Next milestone date" should be moven at the right. This would greatly enhance the readability of the porfolio for managers.
Regards

- We need to be able to design the status reports so that we can chose where the different KPIs are placed within the different categories. As it is today they seems to be placed from the time of creation, meaning that new KPIs will always come last.


Markus Müller-Mertes has posted a new idea "custom column layout for KPIs".

description:
Ideas that come from Planview employees are treated separately from our customers. Once they post an idea the responsible person for managing comments (Somnath Chakravarty) will receive an email where he will be able to decide if the idea should be published or not.

In order for this process to work this way please follow the instructions below.

Make sure that internal users with email "planview" or  "fwd.projectplace.com" to internal are set to ”Internal” so that their ideas aren´t published directly but are moderated.

1. Go to Back office
2. Click on Users
3. Type "Planview" in Search field,  select "Projectplace ideas" in Applications" and select "User" in Role.
4. Click on "Edit" for users presented in search list.
5. Go to the field "User role on application in Projectplace Ideas" and select "Internal". 
6. Click "Save".

Note! Unfortunately it is not possible to make a mass selection and change all at the same time but you have to do one user at a time. Also after you have done step 6 the search resets and you have to start from point 3 again. So a tip is to open the profile page in a new tab and then close them as you have saved your changes.
title: Set Planview users to "Internal" so their ideas get moderated by PP ideas admin

Please, add a "title" to the conversations!
All mails going to the group members' own mail boxes from the pp conversations have the same title (sth like "NN mentioned the group X in a conversation"). That makes it almost impossible to sort and follow conversations, especially when there are many contributions to several conversations at the same time. Our project group is really stressed by the lack of "title feature" in conversations (they even want us to find another project tool). And no, the # is not the answer.

Related
https://projectplace.ideas.dimelo.com/feedbacks/149673-change-subject-emails-projectplace-give-info-folder-document-task-comment

Change subject of emails from Projectplace to give more info about what folder / document / task the comment is about
Automatic emails are sent from Projectplace to a number of people everytime someone comments on folders / documents / tasks. The members in our project receive many such alerts from Projectplace daily and complain about the fact that all of these e-mails have same title in the subject field
Using the name of the folder / document / task the comment is about (or something else that gives more info about what the email is about) would be very useful and it would make it a lot easier to search for specific messages in the inbox later in time

description:
Reported by: Janet van den Einjde
PID: 15055-228471 

"While I was helping a customer with their Plan I found a little bug or in any case something which is a little annoying.
 
When you work from a smaller screen or if you don’t use your browser on full screen, the date boxes for start/end date in the WBS structure open up either above or below the activity line. Whether this happens below or above depends on
 how much space there is in the WBS view. 
 
However, some months are longer than others. So when you move between months, it can happen that the date box moves from above to below the activity line (or the other way around) due to space limitation. Occasionally this will cause people
 to click on another date box and accidentally change things in the plan. 
 
As we don’t have an undo button, this is rather scary."
 

Steps to reproduce
1. Use plan on small/low resolution screen or restore down browser window
2. Click start date on activity close to top or bottom edge
3. It may take some tries, but date box moves between being over or below the activity.

Browser and version: Chrome, possibly others

WORKAROUND: Zoom out to higher resolution
title: CC: Plan - Date box shifts

description:
Reported by: Brandon Lee (User ID:1241762639 ) 
Email blee@avalonbattery.com 
EE Account: 1265964396
PID: 232191

Summary:
Version numbers handling and file name handling works inconsistency within PP, depending of if you upload a file to a folder or copy a file around within document folders. 

Scenario 1:
If upload the same document from your PC into the same document folder in PP where you have the same document filename already, the version number will increment; no file copy is created (by design?)

Scenario 2:
If you copy a document from and to the same folder within PP, the copy will be renamed to "Copy of...". This is not consistent with Scenario 1; it should either be added to the document history for the existing document, or in Scenario 1, it identical filename should be named "Copy of..." if a document with the same name already exist in the document folder.

Scenario 3:
If you remove version handling for document, and you upload the same document from your PC into the same document folder within PP, a new copy with the same name with version number handling will be created in the same folder. This is inconsistant with Scenario 1, where document handling would be enabled?

Scenario 4:
If you in scenario 3 tries to upload the same file a 3'rd time into the same folder, the version number will increment for the document that has version number handling enabled. It will ignore the file that does not have version number handling enabled. This can cause confusion for the user.

Scenario 5:
If you move the same document from a PP Document folder into a folder where the same file name already exist, it will make a copy with the exact same name, and continue with it's own version number handling. This is inconsistant with with Scenario 1 (not added to the existing document version handling), and inconsistant with Scenario 2, where "Copy of..." filename will be created if a matching file with same name exist in the folder where the file is copied to.

Scenario 6:
If you upload the same file again from your PC to a folder where you have for example 2 identical files already with version number handling, one of the files will be updated, 
This causes confution of which document history was updated if you do not pay attention to the version number of the existing documents.


OS: Any
Browser and version: Google Chrome
title: CC: Documents - File upload and copy/past inconsistancy

description:
We noticed that Projects administrators cannot switch on Daily reports.

INTERNAL

Jerker Jakobsson (User ID:483037154 )
Email jerker.jakobsson@projectplace.com
EE Account: Planview

An account administrator seems to have full access in all workspaces that belong to the enterprise account.

So, if the account admin has been provided with a link to a card or a document in a WS that the Account Admin is not part of, then the account Admin will get access to the content in that workspace. One will also see that the account admin is not a Member of that WS. / Robert

I talked to Peter Engstedt about this and he says the following:
"det är inte meningen att man ska kunna komma in - det stämmer. Samtidigt så är det så att man ska ha vissa rättigheter som gör att man får access att hämta dokment som administrator. Användargränssnittet borde dock inte tillåta detta"

Peter asked me to report this as a bug.

Expected outcome:
In agreement with Peter I am creating this card so that it can be decided exactly which access rights an account administrator should have.

Add trace:

The user should be able to edit the attributes, name and the description of a phase from the phase details pane.

description: The user should be able to change the start date and end date of the phase in the timeline view and the phase details pane. The subsequent phase and previous phase adjustments will follow the same logic as moving a phase.
title: The user should be able to change the start date and end date of the phase in the timeline view and the phase details pane.

description: The user should be able to delete a phase from the phase details pane. User should get a confirmation before the delete and once confirmed the phase along with all the associated sub activities will be deleted. The position of the subsequent phases will not change on the timeline.
title: The user should be able to delete a phase from the phase details pane.

description: The user should be able to delete a phase from the activity details pane. User should get a confirmation before the delete and once confirmed the phase along with all the associated sub activities will be deleted. The position of the subsequent phases will not change on the timeline.
title: The user should be able to delete a phase from the activity details pane.
The user should be able to move sub activities between phases in the timeline view

description: The user should be able to expand and collapse the individual phases in an activity. At any time only one activity row can be expanded. Expanding another activity row will automatically collapse the previous activity. The should be an option at the activity level to collapse all it’s phases at one time.
title: The user should be able to expand and collapse the individual phases in an activity.

description: The user will be able to delete the sub activities from the phase details pane. The user should get a confirmation before the delete and once confirmed the sub activity along with associated cards will be deleted.
title: The user will be able to delete the sub activities from the phase details pane.
When the user clicks on the sub activity in the timeline view, the details pane of the sub activity will show up.
When the user clicks on the sub activity in the details pane of the phase , the details pane of the sub activity will show up.
The user should be able to create sub activities from the phase details pane. While creating the sub activity the user will be able to edit there name.

description: The user should be able to add sub activities to a phase on the timeline view. . Once the sub activity is added, it should also show up in the details pane of the phase.
title: The user should be able to add sub activities to a phase on the timeline view.

description:
Reported by: 
Robert Bernhard
robert.bernhard1@ikea.com
EE Account: IKEA IT AB
PID: 15055-260787

In the now unsupported browser Plugin, there was a prompt/dialogue box asking to add a comment, when uploading a new document version. In Projectplace for Windows, there is not.

This means that users forget to comment on the new version, and it has become more difficult for other users to see what changes have been made (without opening the file).

Account owner at Ikea, Martin Jepsson, say that they have received a number of internal requests/complaints about this.

The users are aware of how to add a version comment, but they miss the reminder.

Steps to reproduce
1. Using PP for Windows, open and edit a document
2. Save the document
3. There is no reminder to add a comment to this new version about what changes you have made.

Suggested solution: editing the pop-up notification to contain something like "Click here to add a comment".
This suggestion has not been shared with Ikea.
title: CC: PP for Win - no reminder to comment on new version

description:
Reported by: Ilse Claassen (User ID:1162597528 )
EE Account: Uniresearch BV (PP Account ID: 980392144)
PID: 15055-263555

Dear all,
When we change a meeting in PP, for example date and/or time, only the participants receive an e-mail (outlook meeting change) with the change about this, and not the organiser of the meeting.

( in this case I have created the meeting, but I am not the organiser)

This has caused several problem already with meetings.
Could you please arrange something, so the organiser of the meeting will also receive the change of a meeting?

To add: 
The meeting stays in the organisers' calendar (with the old date, not the new one) So in case the organiser changes the date of a meeting, this will not update in his/her calendar.

Steps to reproduce
1. Create a meeting
2. Make a change to the meeting (edit time or date)
3. No e-mail is send (to the organiser) only to participants

Expected behavior: The organiser should also receive an e-mail with the changes made to the meeting and the calendar should update as well.

OS:
Browser and version: All
title: CC: Meetings - Meeting organiser does not receive email with changes and calendar does not update

description:
New Ideas are emailed to this board automatically from Projectplace Ideas. They can be found at the bottom of this board in the Inbox column (not assigned to an activity).

When managing a new idea follow these steps:
- If it is a relevant Idea (not a support issue, a suggestion that can already be handled some way in PP or something that is not in line with our strategic direction), set a relevant activity (area of the system) on the card.
-  Move the card into 'Open for Voting when you have assigned the same status to the Idea in Projectplace Ideas (the user will get a  communication about this status update from Projectplace Ideas).
- If the Idea is not relevant, move the card to the last column, and set the 'Archived' status with an explanation in Projectplace Ideas.

Exporting a list of documents to Excel from document folder includes column "ID", which is not useful to customers, it is not searchable. Customer want the ID to be searchable.

Steps to reproduce
1. Export list of documents to Excel from the Document folder
2. You will see an "ID" column. 

Expected behavior:
ID should be searchable in document folder.  Customer says: "We use this to organize what documents are where. If I wanted to simply read one of the documents, I would like to look up this document".

If the ID cannot be searchable, we should replace it with the unique URL to the document.

OS: Any
Browser and version: Any

Check list: Workaround? Yes
Describe workaround: Need to search for the document name, which might not be very precise way to find the document, since several documents can have the same name.

description:
Internal

When sharing a link to a template, the user who opens it gets a message on opening "You can now use the template ---". 
However, the template does not show in the list of the user's templates, and it is not possible to select the template when creating a new workspace. It makes no difference whether the user is logged in or not while opening the link.

Steps to reproduce
1. Go to a template, Edit --> Share --> Copy the link with CTRL+C (Copy link button seems broken as well?)
2. Send the link to another user
3. Try using the template as that user.

Expected outcome: The template should be visible in the list in the Templates tool, and it should be available when creating a new workspace. 

WORKAROUND: distribute the template to the account or make the user admin of the template.
title: Copy of CC: Templates - Template shared via link not available

description:
ENHANCEMENT

Reported by: Jonas Ericson (User ID:67095998 )
Email	Jonas.Ericson@stockholm.se
EE Account: Miljöförvaltningen, Stockholms Stad (PP Account ID: 478106096)
Chat ID: P42YBGFS0O

Provide the booking ID already when creating a meeting in the Meetings tool in the workspace.
Nowadays when you book a meeting, an email is send out together with the meeting ID.

The email that is being send out by projectplace after having booked a meeting, ends up in the spam-box. The sender email looks like 'meet.bpfxhq6kqqevgz3sm2vxqpm@automail.projectplace.com' or 'meet.buynuc26lxr4cwk7u556qpm@automail.projectplace.com'.
Whitelisting this domain does not help if you work in a large organization with different departments and working with external companies.

Notes from customer:
You could however provide the meeting ID already in the booking form - would save me some time not having to wait for the automated e-mail, looking for it in spam-box, extracting the meeting Id and send it out to my meeting attendees - who are scattered all over the world.
Because I'm in a concern with 46,000 employees and a very strict policy. Then I work together with 200 external companies that all need to go through the same white-listing procedure. Before this is done, I am already retired...
title: CC: Meetings - Show meeting ID already in booking form

description:
Reported by: (Chat: gerrit.schutz@envidatec.com)
Thomas Frank (User ID:1008920869 )
Email	thomas.frank@envidatec.com
EE Account: Envidatec (PP Account ID: 1134977546)
Chat ID: P5GHM3UDFX

The customer wrote that the Task report was missing all time reported from last week, and that the report is not useful, it looks like: 

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><Account xmlns="http://www.projectplace.com/shema"><Name>Envidatec</Name><CreationDate>2018-03-12T11:28:37</CreationDate><PeriodStartDate>2018-03-05T00:00:00</PeriodStartDate><PeriodEndDate>2018-03-09T00:00:00</PeriodEndDate><Projects /><Resources /><Tasks /><Reports /></Account>


According to the customer did the Plan report not show any reported time at all from last week. I was able to reproduce, but when I asked Jon in Slack he could not reproduce. I have attached the discussion on Slack and pasted here below as well. According to Somnath could this be a bug.

Steps to reproduce
1. Go to a workspace and report time on an activity
2. Go to Account Administration and export Time Report to XML
3. Select the correct dates and select Plan

Expected outcome: The outcome should show the reported hours on the activity

OS: All
Browser and version: All

Can you reproduce? Yes
Check list: Workaround? No 
No error trace

(Slack notes:)
When you decide to export time reports to xml via account administration, you get the option to choose between Tasks and Plan. But Tasks is an old feature, will this be updated?

And, when exporting either of the two, the report that you download is not very useful. It looks like:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><Account xmlns="http://www.projectplace.com/shema"><Name>Acme International Inc.</Name><CreationDate>2018-03-12T11:31:49</CreationDate><PeriodStartDate>2018-02-01T00:00:00</PeriodStartDate><PeriodEndDate>2018-02-28T00:00:00</PeriodEndDate><Projects /><Resources /><Tasks /><Reports /></Account>

and it does not contain any reported hours on cards/activites, altough the helppage says:

"As an account administrator you can export the time reports for the workspaces in the account. All time reports for resources that work in workspaces within the account are put together in XML format."
https://success.planview.com/Projectplace/Account_administration/Export_time_reports_for_the_account

Somnath:
will look into this ...seems like a bug

Jon:
It doesn't seem bugged to me
It does include reported time as far as I can see
Not from cards though
Only cares about time on actual activities, doesn't bubble up
I suspect the "Plan" addition was made to this in order to satisfy some specific customer who used this specific XML-format for their task
tasks
Completely useless feature to 99.99% of our client base and should be outright murdered
title: CC: Account Administration - Export time reports to XML missing reported time

description:
Behavior:
1. Dropdown selector in the toolbar with a label view. View: Calendar

2. The default value of dropdown: Calendar.

3. Values inside dropdown in the order: Calendar, and Grid.

4. On clicking, I should be able to see the current selection.

5. On clicking Grid>  drop-down shows the current value selected

description:
Reported by: Stacie Gabriel (User ID:1323669313 )
EE Account: Molex, LLC (PP Account ID: 1377202095)
INTERNAL

Project: DVPR 9999
https://ppsa.projectplace.com/ppadmin/admin.cgi/0/1565756840?op=projectdetails

When an assigned card is connected to a board in a workspace that is synced to Planview, that card will first show up at My overview - My work - New, but after a refresh the card will disappear (see video attached).

When you go to the card and move it to a different column on the board, and go back to My overview, the card appears again (and will disappear again after refresh). When you click on the card, the first option in the details pane says in green letters: 'Go to board..'. But when you click on it, it will take you to the Plan, instead of the board. 

I believe this is all due to the fact that the workspace is synced to Planview.

Expected behavior: If a user is working in a workspace that is synced to Planview, the user must be aware of the fact that it is not working the same as a workspace that is not synced.
Also, we should come with a solution for the bug that when you click on 'Go to board', but it actually takes you to the Plan.

OS: Windows
Browser and version: Newest Chrome, Firefox

Check list: Workaround? No 
Video attached with card disappearing issue
No error traces
title: CC: Integrations/My Overview - Card disappears from "My Inbox" when synced to Planview [NEW CARD]

description:
Each card represents a new or updated feature requiring one or more articles to be added or updated in the Customer Success Center (CSC). 

**Note!** Customer Experience Team (CET) need 3 workdays before publication date of articles.

**Author name and team:**
Silvija and Aurora

**Feature description:**
First step in changing the view in single portfolio view was to decide which columns to hide and show in single portfolio view. Now we have also made it possible to change the column order.

**Link to article drafts (include all that apply):**
https://success.planview.com/Projectplace/Project_portfolios/Work_with_portfolios

**Special request (if any):**
**Release with Monthly Update (Yes or No):**
**Include on Monthly Product Release page (Yes or No)**
For PO to reply.

**HOW TO:**
1) COPY this card and fill in the above.
2) When ready for review indicate desired date of publishing by selecting a due date.
3) Move your card to next column Ready for review and assign? and @-reference Steve Maisel to review the draft(s).
4) Once card has been reviewed and moved to the Team review column  the author will be notified again to review the new/updated article drafts insuring the information is accurate and complete. 
5)  If corrections or changes are needed make the updates and notify.  If Dev/Auth approves the new/updated articles, move the card to the Ready to be published column and notify Steve. 

**Workprocess and working with the content**
If you would like to learn more about the process and how to work with content in customer success center please read this document here:
https://service.projectplace.com/pp/pp.cgi/r1229344737
title: Portfolios – Change Position of Columns in Single Portfolio View – SD

description:
Recurring issue so spend one day to write batch to see if we can reproduce / find issue based on hypothesis.




Reported by: carolyn.donaldson@factset.com 
EE Account: FactSet Research Systems
PID: 15055-294053 
SF ID: 00033301

**PP Support has disconnected the activity 5) Testing from the connected board, which did not seem to resolve this.**

Copied from ticket per Eric Totte and Gary Lee:

According to the  pp_card table in PVE there are 26 cards mapped to 1 task in PVE, but in the summary log file all tasks for the project are flagged with the same error.  After Eric’s investigation, he apparently believed that the problem was with the PP mapping. 

Planlet already has children however a Board Connection has been made, therefore subsequent updates are failing. 

Work was created in PVE and set to sync with PP.  There are a combination of tasks and milestones, which are either open or assumed complete.  Customer has verified that tasks have not been changed to milestones or tasks changed from leaf level to a parent level.  PP_SYNC = PP$SyncPVE

Error being generated on all tasks:
Message: The following activity could not be synced because the associated project has a Projectplace board associated to an activity that in PVE has either (A) become a milestone or (B) become non-leaf level.  

PP Project ID: 1693710677; PVE Project ID: 82010; Name: Voyager Retirement: Historical Data:Single Company 

Board: 894534 
Planlet ID: 973014727; PVE Task ID: 188742; Name: Testing

Full ticket details in attached PDF
title: CC: Plan/Integration - PVE: error on tasks

description:
Reported by:
Povilas Konopackas (User ID:1307692371 )
Email povilas@layerv.com
EE Account: LayerV Ltd (PP Account ID: 1333008826)
SFID: 00143261

When this user tries to delete an account user's user account, he gets the error message "An error has occurred, please contact PP support".

The concerned user is an administrator of an archived workspace and member of several other workspaces (some of them archived).

We at support we cannot either delete the user account of an account user if the user is administrator of a workspace and member of several other workspaces. 
But we don't get any error message, the user's use account simply isn't deleted.
After the page has uploaded, you can still see the user account that you tried to delete.

Steps to reproduce
1. Go to Account administration / People tab
2. Select a user that administrates at least one workspace and is member of a least one workspace
3. Click on "Delete user account"

Expected outcome:
The selected user account should be deleted.

OS:
Windows 10
Browser and version:
IE 11

Can Support reproduce? Yes and No (see above)

Workaround? No 
Describe workaround:

Add print screens/videos
Add trace when applicable
Add comment and tag **CC Issues**
title: CC: Account administration - Impossible to delete user account

Documents section scrolling down to go into a subfolder. 
When the box next to the folder is marked before going into it when you go back in the browser you will be at the same point in the document list.
If folder is not marked before going in you will end up at the top of the page when going back in the browser.

Steps to reproduce
1.  documents tool: scroll down to a subfolder
2. click the box next to the folder name
3. open the folder
4. in the browser use the arrow to back to previous page.
5. end up in the deocument section same level as the folder

2. DON'T click the box next to name of subfolder
3. go into folder then back
4. ending up at the top of the document section


Expected outcome:
different outcomes by design?

OS:
Browser and version: all

Can Support reproduce? Yes



Issues will be labeled with severity level Major, Critical, Moderate or Minor according to this chart (in CC workspace): https://service.projectplace.com/pp/pp.cgi/r869908167

description:
Reported by: luca.di.filippo@ikea.com
EE Account: IKEA IT AB (PP Account ID: 168917563)
SFID: 00153699

Access documents using the document-URL in the "Public documents" folder causes "An error has occurred". Happens only if you have not accessed the "public documents" first. Seems to be a cookie issue. 

Steps to reproduce
1. Share the "Public document" URL to an external user. 
2. Brows to the a document in that folder through external site. 
3. Copy the URL for a document. 
4.  Pas the URL in an new tab in your current web browser; the file will start downloading.
5. Past the same url into a web browser that has not been used to access the same "Public documents" folder (consider first clearing/blocking cookies for that web browser)
6. You will get "An error has occured."

Expected outcome:
It is a public link for none-PP users, so the document URL should be able to be accessed without landing on the startpage of the "Public documents" folder first (-to create a cookie).

OS: All
Browser and version: All

Can support reproduce? Yes

Check list: Workaround? Yes
Describe workaround: Go to the startpage of the "Public document" first, then you can access a document URL directly afterwards. It seems to be related to web browser cookies for PP.

Attachments:
* picture of the error message.
* Video where I show that it will not work to download a document directly using the document link, unless and PP cookie has been created first.
title: CC: Public Site - Error access documents using document URL

description:
Reported by: rickard.borg@innovapro.se
EE Account: 1476042663
SFID: 00157004

Plan - Export to Excel - Cards Missing Due to Hidden Board

Steps to reproduce
1. Add a new card to a new sub-activity
2. Attach a New Board (no cards on Board) to that activity
3.Mark the sub-activity as Done
4. Go to Boards and Hide the Board
5. Export Plan to Excel

The excel sheet does no show any cards. If you remove the board and export again the card is now visible!

Expected behavior: The cards should always show when exporting to Excel.

OS: Win
Browser and version: Chrome 69

Can support reproduce  Yes

Check list: Workaround Yes
Describe workaround: Remove Board
title: CC: Plan - Export to Excel - Cards Missing Due to Hidden Board

description:
Reported by:
Helge Ahrens (User ID:1016478653 )
Email ha@codan.de
EE Account:
CODAN Medizinische Geräte (PP Account ID: 1009942065)
SFID: 00159560

After setting up the calendar feed in Outlook, this user realized that no event is displayed in his Outlook.

Also, he gets an error message in Outlook (see enclosed).

N.B. When setting up the calendar feed, he used his own link.

Steps to reproduce
1. Follow the instructions herein in order to set-up the calendar feed:
https://success.planview.com/Projectplace/Projectplace_fundamentals/Manage_your_user_account_and_settings#Set_Up_the_Calendar_Feed
2. None of the events that are likely to appear in Outlook, appear

Expected behavior:
The following events should appear if selected from Settings / Calendar feed:
-Boards. Cards that are assigned to you and includes a due date.  
-Documents. Due dates for document reviews you participate in or have initiated (only for Projectplace Enterprise).
-Plan. End date for activities and milestone. 

OS:

Browser and version:

Can support reproduce? Yes/No. My events don't appear in my Outlook calendar, but I don't get an error message in Outlook.

Check list: Workaround? No 
Describe workaround:

Add print screens/videos to your card
Add trace when applicable
Add comment and tag **CC Issues**

Issues will be labeled with severity level with corresponding resolution times:
CRITICAL: ASAP/hotfix
MAJOR: 2 weeks if technically feasible
MODERATE: 3 months
MINOR: No defined resolution time
https://service.projectplace.com/pp/pp.cgi/r869908167
title: CC: Calendar Feed - No event is displayed in Outlook

INTERNAL

Cannot create new line after a #Tag unless you create a space first

Steps to reproduce
1. Create a #tag in Conversation
2. Press Enter to create a new line
3. You have to make a space first then press Enter to be able to create a new line.
4. This only happens when you write a tag. It works as it should with regular words.

Expected behavior:
Be able to make new line by pressing Enter after a tag without making a space first.

OS: All
Browser and version: All

Can support reproduce? Yes

Check list: Workaround? Yes
Describe workaround:Make a space first.
title: CC: Conversation - Press Enter after a Tag does not work

description:
Reported by:
Viktoria Argulander (User ID:1178960890 )
Email viktoria.argulander@sl.se
EE Account: AB Storstockholms Lokaltrafik, SL (Trafikförvaltningen) (PP Account ID: 313071286)
SFID: 00161242

This user gets the error message "Forbidden due to bad/missing XSRF token" when she for instance:

-Creates a folder,
-Attaches a file to a folder,
- Saves her changes in a file.

Thanks to our developers we know that what needs to be done when getting this errror message is to clear cache and cookies and restart the browser.

This is not sufficient for this customer though, who wants to know the following:;

1) Why does she get this error message?
2) What can be done in order to prevent getting this error message?

Steps to reproduce
1. Work inside Projectplace
2. The error message "Forbidden due to bad/missing XSRF token" appears.

Expected behavior:
This error message shouldn't appear.

OS: Windows 10
Browser and version: IE 11

Can support reproduce? No

Check list: Workaround? Yes
Describe workaround: Clear cache and cookies in the and restart the browser.
title: CC: Error message "Forbidden due to bad/missing XSRF token"

description:
URL to use: https://service.projectplace.com/#project/PROJECT_ID/administration


The application is vulnerable to insufficient page authorization attacks.
Insufficient page authorization vulnerabilities occur when an application fails to provide the appropriate level of access control, either through failure at the permissions level, oversight in application design (e.g. authorization bypass logic),or any other number of disparate means. When successfully exploiting this vulnerability, attackers or other application users can gain access to content or portions of the application and/or web site they would not otherwise have access to when operating within the confines of their current role or authorization.

In this particular instance, Emagined Security consultants were able to gain access to **application pages** and data above the privilege level (i.e. authorization-level) of the assigned user role. Specifically, leveraging this vulnerability, Emagined Security consultants were able to obtain access to administrator-level content with an end-user account, as well as execute functions.

It should be noted that the method to exploit this issue at the end user account level was through knowing the full application path to the administrative-level content to be accessed. While it might be argued that a typical end user account would never know the path to administrative data, the respectivedevelopment team should operate from the position that the entire application and site will be mapped, and that absolute or relative paths to content and data will be exposed. Operating under this principle will allow the development team to secure access to content at a more granular level.

An attacker operating under this vulnerability who is able to successfully access content can view and potentially make changes to data and content arbitrarily; impacting the Client and its application’s integrity.
Emagined Security consultants observed that even though the administrator-level project interface was accessible to under-privileged accounts, very little functionality exposed could be leverage by the underprivileged
accounts. Specifically, only 'archive workspace' and radio buttons could be enabled; all other changes appeared to be disallowed. As a result, severity of this issue has been lowered to reflect the limited impact from a successful attack.
title: Finding 10: Insufficient Page Authorization

description:
When all reviewers have finished a manual review, the review is still open and needs to be manually closed. There are two things I've noticed about this:

1) in case the initiator is the last reviewer, there is no email notification sen to this user and the review disappears from my overview so there is no way for them to know that they have to go and manually close the review

2) the text on the closure button says 'go to the next step' (see attachment in swedish :-) ) - need a separate string for the last closure button in case we keep this behaviour?

QUESTION: should we not close the review automatically if all users have approved it, even if the rest of the review stages have to be manually kicked-off?
title: Manual review workflow - closure

description:
INTERNAL

Not possible to download a file as you can do in the Document tool from the menu option in a card.

This is particularly a problem if you want to download and not open i.g. an unknown filetype (in my case a Mac file *.dmg on a Windows PC) which you want to save to your PC/Mac; you are being prompted to choose what application to open it with, which is not the desired option if you let Watson handle the file you are trying to save instead of opening.

Steps to reproduce
1. Add a file to your card.
2. Try to download the the attachment instead of opening it. 


Expected behavior:
To be able to download a file instead of opening it when a file is attached to a card.

OS: All
Browser and version: All

Can support reproduce? Yes

Check list: Workaround? Yes
Describe workaround: Quit Watson, and let the web browser give you the option to save the file to your PC/Mac

See attached screen print
title: CC: Boards - not possible to download a file as u can do in the Document tool

description:
Reported by:
Brandon Lee (User ID:1241762639 )
Email blee@avalonbattery.com
EE Account: Avalon Battery (PP Account ID: 1265964396)
SFID: 00180040

When using the search function and clicking on a file that has been deleted=is in the recycle bin, you are taken to the Documents.

See attached print screens.

Steps to reproduce
1. Search for a file that has been deleted=is in the recycle bin,
2. The search results indicate that the file is in the recycle bin,
3. But when clicking on the file in order to access it, you end up in the Documents tab.

Expected behavior:
You should end up in the recycle bin.

OS: Any
Browser and version: Any

Can support reproduce? Yes

Check list: Workaround? No 
Describe workaround:

Add print screens/videos to your card
Add trace when applicable
Add comment and tag **CC Issues**

Issues will be labeled with severity level with corresponding resolution times:
CRITICAL: ASAP/hotfix
MAJOR: 2 weeks if technically feasible
MODERATE: 3 months
MINOR: No defined resolution time
https://service.projectplace.com/pp/pp.cgi/r869908167
title: CC: Recycle bin - When searching and clicking on a file that has been deleted, you end up in the Documents tab

description:
Reported by: bjoern-inge.haga@wintershall.com
EE Account: Wintershall Norge 446565557
SFID: 00179114

"The Project Place Desktop App does connection testing by DNS resolving the api.projectplace.com host before trying to connect via our proxy server. With this behaviour the test will never succeed even if we have connectivity.

By manipulating settings on the client I am able to get it working by allowing it to resolve external DNS addresses, but is not necessary and allowed in our environment as we have a proxy server infrastructure that handles DNS resolution. 

This is the same way for everyone who has a proxy server, the proxy server resolves address. Client should not do DNS lookup when proxy settings is enabled."

OS: 
Browser and version: IE11

Can support reproduce? No

Check list: Workaround? Yes 
Describe workaround: User is able to manipulate settings on the client to resolve external DNS addresses.
title: CC: Desktop App - Proxy server network management

description:
Reported by:
Atosa Shafiee (User ID:1523407321 )
Email atosa.shafiee@ekan.com
EE Account: AB Stockholmshem (PP Account ID: 1149221368)
SFID: 00179365

Concerned user:
Rebecca Bäck (User ID:489281039 )
Email	rebecca.back@stockholmshem.se

Project: Vera - Utrullning Fastighetssystem
General (1581292076 )

This user belongs to two different groups within this ws.
When the access rights for those two grups to a specific folder are set to "No access" versus "Read" or "Read and write", the lowest access rules.

This is not correct, since it's the highest access that should determine the user's access to each folder.

Steps to reproduce
1. Place a member in two different groups within a ws,
2. These two groups have the following access rights to a folder:
-no access
-read or read and write
3. The user has "no access" to the folder since it's the lowest access that dermines his/her access.

Expected behavior:
It's the highest access that should determine the user's access to each folder.

OS: Any
Browser and version: Any

Can support reproduce? No

Check list: Workaround? No 
Describe workaround:

Add print screens/videos to your card
Add trace when applicable
Add comment and tag **CC Issues**

Issues will be labeled with severity level with corresponding resolution times:
CRITICAL: ASAP/hotfix
MAJOR: 2 weeks if technically feasible
MODERATE: 3 months
MINOR: No defined resolution time
https://service.projectplace.com/pp/pp.cgi/r869908167
title: CC: Members - Issues in accessing folders if belonging to 2 different groups

description:
Reported by: 
Susanne Dornick (User ID:964551361 )
Email sdornick@e-bridge.com
EE Account:
SFID: 00180926

When you use two screens and the screens are not sorted next to each other, but one on top of the other you cannot switch screens during an online meeting session.

Steps to reproduce
1. Start of online meeting session - default screen is screen 1 (you see the hook in “Bildschirm 1”),
2. I put a hook in “Bildschirm 2” as well and you can see that I’m sharing both screens now, however the fields “Bildschirm 1” and “Bildschirm 2” disappeared.
3. I started a new session an took the hook out of “Bildschirm 1”. You can see that I’m sharing no screen anymore, and again the fields “Bildschirm 1” and “Bildschirm 2” disappeared.

Expected behavior:
You should be able to share both screens even if these are one on top of the other.

OS: Any
Browser and version: Any

Can support reproduce? Yes

Check list: Workaround? No
is_blocked_reason: No fix due to the rebuild of the meetings solution.
title: CC: Online meetings - Not possible to share screens when these are one on top of the other / stacked vertically in Windows

description:
Reported by: tomasz.szemraj@cmslegal.com
EE Account: CMS Legal Services EEIG (PP Account ID: 630892074)
SFID: 00180375

In 'Issues', exporting an issue to Excel crashes if email body is more than 32 thousand characters.


Steps to reproduce
1. Send an email to 'Issues' that contains more than 32.767 characters in the body. 
2. Select and export it to Excel 
3. PP Crashes with error code XFQaxmeud1h67qYXQrJYewAAACc

Expected behavior:
No crash when exporting to Excel. Maybe limit the body text export to maximum 32.767 characters (sounds like an Integer data type), or change the data type to i.g. Long? 

OS: Any
Browser and version: Any

Can support reproduce? Yes

Check list: Workaround? No 

See attached screen print saying "Something went wrong. Contact PP support".
title: CC: Issues - Exporting to Excel crashes if email body is more than 32 thousand characters

description:
INTERNAL

If a history event's text string exceeds the allowed length, the text is clipped and there is no option to see the clipped text. In this case, I am missing the date of the event.


Steps to reproduce
1. Go To Account Admin --> Workspaces
2. Open the details pane for a workspace and click History
3. If the string exceeds the length of the pane the text is clipped 

Expected behavior: Field should allow line breaks or the clipped text should be displayed when hovering over the ellipsis 

OS: Win10
Browser and version: Seen i Chrome, no other browser tested

Can support reproduce? Yes

Check list: Workaround? No
title: CC: Account admin - Workspace details pane: text clipped on history events

description:
INTERNAL

When a user clicks _Forgot password_ on the login page, and enters an email address that doesn't exist as a user, the message "Email sent" is displayed. No email is sent, and the user will not know that the email address is incorrect. Once the user discovers that the email address was incorrect, they might even worry that a reset password email was sent to someone else.

Steps to reproduce
1. Go to https://service.projectplace.com/forgot_password
2. Type an email address that does not exist as a user, for example ouasujafpaifjpo.ijohansson@fwd.planview.com
3. "Email sent" is displayed. In the PPSA tool _Search forgotten password-mail_ no email is found. 

Expected behavior: There should be a message stating that the user does not exist.
title: CC: Login - "Forgot pw" email seems to be sent for non-existing user

description:
Reported by: Travis Dickerson (User ID:1000000001812933 )
Email	tdickerson@nuvasive.com
EE Account: NuVasive (PP Account ID: 1000000001368587)
SFID: 00188320

When creating a new project in PPM Pro using a template from Projectplace, the dependencies indicated in the template do not populate in the newly created project in PPM Pro. Also, when creating a workspace in Projectplace based on a template that contains a Plan with dependencies, and sync it to PPM Pro, the dependencies are missing in the plan in PPM Pro.

Steps to reproduce
1. Create a workspace based on a template that has dependencies in the Plan
2. Sync it to PPM Pro
3. In PPM Pro, the dependencies are missing

Expected behavior: Dependencies should show in PPM Pro

OS:
Browser and version:

Can support reproduce? Yes
Check list: Workaround? No (or add all the dependencies manually)
title: CC: Templates - Dependencies from Projectplace Template not carrying over to PPM Pro

4.	Include **links** to **ALL Article Drafts** to be reviewed and edited:
https://success.planview.com/Projectplace/Projectplace_Fundamentals/Manage_Your_User_Account_and_Settings?mt-draft=true

https://success.planview.com/Projectplace/Account_administration/Manage_Account_Settings?mt-draft=true

a.	**Existing Feature Update**

We've made two feature updates:
1) on the user level (User Settings / Security / two-step verification) we've added the option to use Yubikey for 2FA.
2) we've added the ability to require users to use 2FA during login on the workspace level (Workspace admin / password & security requirements)

7.	**Date and Time of Publication** When ready - feature is released to customers, and will be communicated in the May Product update communication.

description:
We need to update the dropdown component with the following

**Make it clear that we have several categories of dropdowns (names not decided)**

- Action menu

Meaning that you select an option and an action will be performed.

- Value changes menu

E.g board selector. When you select something in the dropdown, the trigger will update the value based on the selection.


**Single/Multi**
- Single select dropdown
You can only select/click on one action in the list

- Multi select dropdown
You can select/click on several actions in the list


_They all share the dropdown list element but have different use cases._
title: Dropdown/dropdown list element updates

description:
INTERNAL

When a user has both SSO and password on their user account, it is not clear to them how they should log in to our apps (mobile and Watson). 
Users with only SSO use app password.
Users with only password use that. 

When a user has both, when SSO for example was enabled after the creation of the user account and when SSO is not enforced, they should use their password to log in to apps.
However, many users forget this password and are not aware of its existence, since they use SSO to log in to PP. CC is contacted weekly by users who are unsuccessful in logging in to the apps.

Steps to reproduce
1. Log in to PP with a user account that has both password and SSO (your @planview.com user may have this)
2. Log in to mobile app or Watson. You must use the password that the user has.


SUGGESTED SOLUTIONS:
a: allow SSO login to apps 
b: remove password from users as soon as SSO is activated on the account
c: add better information to the login dialogue in both mobile and watson apps
d: add better information to CSC https://success.planview.com/Projectplace/Projectplace_Fundamentals/Manage_Your_User_Account_and_Settings#App_Passwords

OS: any
Browser and version: any

Can support reproduce? Yes

Workaround? Yes
Describe workaround: Reset password from login page or user settings and log in to apps with that
title: CC: Passwords - users who have both SSO and password don't know how to log in to apps
Plan : Find out how big dependency footprint is

description:
Reported by: patrik.abrahamsson@serneke.se
EE Account: Serneke Group AB (PP Account ID: 1228403232)
PID: 15055-292024

Downloading empty folders from the document tool is excluded from the zip file. This causes problems for many customers want to maintain and download the folderstructure.

Steps to reproduce
1. Create a folder with no data in it.
2. Select the folder and download it
3. The empty folder is excluded. 

* It is not the default behavior of zip format to exclude empty folders. This is currently being done with a zip-parameter within the PP service.
* It causes concerns for the customers, as they need to retain the folderstructure. 
Sample folder structure:
"1. Customer" (contains files)
"2. Documents" (does not contain any files)
"3. Proposals" (contains files)

Business impact: 
In the sample above, folder "2. Documents" are excluded and will not be added to the zip-file. This is considered as dataloss for the customers, as they need to identify which folders are missing and then recreate the missing folders manually. This is very timeconsuming, and the customers will feel our document download tool is unstable and does not work as intended. 

Expected outcome:
Do not exclude empty folders when zipping the selected document folders, but maintain the folderstructure. 

OS: Any
Browser and version:Any

Can Support reproduce? Yes

Workaround? No
We are telling these customers to recreate the missing folders, however this will cause unhappy customers and loose faith in our system.

Note:
We have even added a note about this behavior in:

["Export and download documents"] (https://success.planview.com/Projectplace/Document_management/Export_and_download_documents)

*. "....You should also delete empty documents and folders (with size zero) before downloading."
title: Kopia av CC: Documents - Zipping empty folders is excluded from the zip

description:
### Summary of design feedback: ###

__How do designers signoff today:__
- Designers primarly fous on signing of using docz
- Some access a developers machine to see a local variant of docz. 
- Designers in general do not want to build environments to signoff. URL to place to signoff like react-pvds.rnd..
- Still some questions/not clear what is test what is signoff? (Test open for anyone, signoff only by designer? Do we need both steps?)


__Problems today:__
- There is a gap for Projectplace components, no site like the ui-kit components.
- Fonts are not correct on uikit site.
- Docz mobile signoff does not work.
- Certain links to specs in docz are outdated (go to inivsion)
- Deep-link to page in docz does not work in react-pvds site
- Can not change height of playgrounds in docz
- If docz page should ever go public we would need to style it more consistently.

__Suggestions for improvements:__
- Please add where the code is (branch?) and how to signoff, just like how to test. Be pro-active. Certain components need to be signed off in context? Is z-index part of the component? Add information about what the component takes care of and what not. 
- Inform when code will be merged so that designer in charge of signoff knows.
- Always mention if something from the spec is out of scoped.
- Instructions in a certain style is appreciated (see cursor page in docz)
title: Improve the resources for testing and reviewing finished components

Reported by: Jerker Jakobsson
jjakobsson@planview.com
INTERNAL 

In Jerker's template based on an existing workspace, there are links between cards and Documents even though the files were not copied to the template. 

In the new workspace based on that template, the links between cards and documents are intact, even though the files are not available from Documents.  

In Jerker's new workspace, clicking the attached file on the card *directed him to the original workspace*.
When I tried to reproduce, the file was instead downloaded.

Steps to reproduce
1. Create a template based on an existing workspace. The workspace must have a card where there is an attachment from Documents. Choose "copy only folder structure".
2. Base a new workspace on this template
3. Go to cards and click the attachment. The file will either be downloaded or you will be directed to the original workspace.

Expected outcome: Should the files be available when the template creator chooses to not copy files
title: Copy of CC: Templates - Files remain available on cards when they are not included in the template.

description:
INTERNAL

Projectplace crashes with/without Watson when trying to download large files (2.2GB). It works on https://service.projectplace.com/

You can upload larger files than you can download due to Akamai. Download limit is 1.7GB, but upload is way more. 

We need to add a userfriendly warning if the user tries to upload more than 1.7GB, and then block the upload of the file, as they cannot download it again afterward. 

See attached screen prints.

Test with the attached *.mp4 file.

• Uploading large *.mp4 file (2.2GB) to a card and documents works.
• Downloading from the card and documents using Watson fails.
• Downloading from the card and documents without Watson fails.
• Downloading from the card and documents without watson on https://service-origin.projectplace.com works.


Expected behavior: Block user from uploading larger files than 1.7GB has Akamai has a download limit of 1.7GB


OS: Any
Browser and version: Any

Can support reproduce? Yes

Workaround? No 
Describe workaround:
title: CC: Documents - DL of large files crashes Watson and Projectplace

description:
INTERNAL

*The installation file has version 1.0.0.0, the installed version has version 1.3.0.0. This will cause a problem for IT admins that rely in automatic update of software versions; to make sure the users have the latest installed version, an IT admin needs to rely on the version in the installation package, which they use to compare the with the installed version. If the installation file always has version 1.0, it will never update an installed version of Watson, if it has i.g. version 1.2.0.0

* Version number 1.0 is also visible in the list of applications installed in Windows, it should show version 1.3.

This might apply to the *.msi file as well, but this uses as productcode instead, so I am not sure if this new productcode will be considered as new version.

Steps to reproduce
1.  Download Projectplace-for-windows.exe
2. Check details-tab in the property of the installation file
3. It shows version 1.0.0.0

Expected behavior: Should be version 1.3.0.0

OS: Windows
Browser and version: Any

Can support reproduce? Yes

Workaround? No 

See attached screen print.
title: CC: Watson install version - Package has ver 1.0.0.0 when installed version has ver. 1.3.0.0

description:
Reported by: joan.herber@hollister.com
EE Account: Hollister (PP Account ID: 1229971974)
Case or Chat ID: Q0ETZ60D49

When installing new version 1.3 exe version of Watson, it offers to upgrade older watson version. When doing so, it will prompt for Windows Admin permissions. Customer has 370 Projectplace users that are randomly upgrading Watson, so this causes a lot of work for them.



Steps to reproduce
1. Install Watson 1.2.1. exe
2. Install Watson 1.3 on top of version 1.21 . exe
3. You will get a prompt if you want to upgrade. Choose 'Yes'.
4. The will as a next step be prompted with dialog window to enter admin credentials. 

Expected behavior:
The new version 1.3 should uninstall older version before installing the latest version. 

OS: Windows
Browser and version: All

Can support reproduce? Yes

Workaround? Yes
Describe workaround: Uninstall older version, then upgrade. This will avoid the Windows security prompt. 

See screen prints
title: CC: Watson - upgrade causes prompt for admin permissions

description:
Reported by: Markus Klarmann
EE Account: Planview
Case or Chat ID: 00236813

When you create a template based on an ongoing WS, all activities that are set to Done, will remain in Done in the new WS.

If you will start a new WS, why would you have the activities in Done?
(if you have a large ongoing WS, you don't want to start messing with the activities, and if you don't do that you have to edit every WS you create from this template, since there is no possibility to edit this in the template.)


Steps to reproduce
1. create a template based on an ongoing workspace (with some activities set to Done)
2. Create a new WS based on this template
3. activities still in Done.

Expected behavior: You should be able to edit the status on the activities in the template.

OS:
Browser and version:

Can support reproduce? Yes

Workaround? Yes - a really bad one. Y
Describe workaround: you have to edit all the activities in you ongoing WS before you can create an Template.


Add print screens/videos to your card
Add trace when applicable
Add comment and tag **CC Issues**
title: CC: Template/plan - Activities remains in Done, when creating a template

description:
As a normal user of Projectplace, I should be able to add shared links using file picker by selecting the documents in a site configured by workspace administration

Constraints - 
1) The workspace administrator must have connected the sharepoint site to the workspace
2) The document libraries of the configured site are shown in File picker and on subsequent selection, show the contents of the document library - files and folders
3) To use the sub-site in the file picker, the subsite must be selected in the workspace administration.

Out of scope -
1) The subsite of the configured site will not be shown in the file picker
2) Access manangement of the selected files will not be managed within/by Projectplace.
title: [STORY] Shared Links: Add Sharepoint to Filepicker

We had several customer deleting groups by mistake, when they first select a group, then searches for a member and thinks they are just deleting the member in their filtered view.  

More info: 
The warning you get if you have selected several members lets you know how many members you have selected, but this does not happen if you also have selected any groups. Both warnings should contain a number letting you know how many you have selected. 


Steps to reproduce
1. Select a group under "Members" 

2. Use the members search filter to find another person, and select this person. You know think you have selected only 1 person/item.

3. Delete this person. You have now deleted 2 items in your members/groups list. The warning message looks like a generic warning message when groups are involved.

Expected behavior:
More detailed warning with (x) number of items you have selected, as in the warning message if you have selected members only. 

OS: Any
Browser and version: Any

Can support reproduce? Yes

Workaround? Yes
Describe workaround:
Remove search filter so that you see all members before you delete any selected members or groups.

See attached video and screen print.
title: Copy of CC: Members - deleting members using filters might lead to deleting members outside of the filter unintentionally

description:
INTERNAL

Customers tend to terminate the wrong workspaces by mistake, despite a very clear warning message before they complete the termination. This causes lot of pain for the customer, as we cannot restore their WS to the former state. 

Suggestions:
Delay the termination of the WS.

* Archive the WS
* Hide the WS for all
*  Schedule WS termination after X days (30?)


Things to consider that came up in discussion:
* Members / licenses usage?
* Assignments?
* Trashcan for workspaces?
* Extra email to confirm the deletion of the WS?
* If the admin deletes lots of workspaces; should an email be sent for every workspace the admin just deleted? 
* Email to the admin who deleted the WS stating "John Doe just deleted workspace <ws name> , was this by mistake? Don't worry, you have 30 days to fix it... press this button"


This was discussed in slack: pp_iteam: 
https://planview.slack.com/archives/C160V8B7Y/p1582105497051000

Case or Chat ID: 00283173

We have the Projectplace/PPM Pro integration enabled. As a result our project plan from PPM Pro ports over to Projectplace. Recently one of our teams updated their project plan in PPM Pro, elevating a task/activity to become a summary task. This activity had previously been assigned to a Projectplace Board. Projectplace does not allow task that are summary tasks to be placed on boards. As a result we expected Projectplace would remove this updated activity from the board as a result of it now being a summary task. This expected behavior did not occur. We attempted to simply remove the task from the Projectplace board but the system will not allow this to happen.

1. create task in PPM Pro

description:
Reported by: elin.eljaouhari@tjejzonen.se
EE Account: Tjejzonen (PP Account ID: 432259131)
Case or Chat ID: 00259259

Using Watson, you might get error "Upload failed". You will not be able to save your document and have to cancel it. Your document will be lost if you do. The problem can continue to happen with several documents, and the problem might vanish. It has vanished by itself for some customers when they called support. 

The document they worked on is not in the Download folder.

The workspace has not run out of space. 

Projectplace.log contains the message (translated from Swedish) "

127.0.0.1 - - [23/Apr/2020 09:56:04] "GET / HTTP/1.1" 403 -
Error: [WinError 2] Det går inte att hitta filen: 'C:\\Users\\Info\\Projectplace\\Downloads/Deltagarlista grundutbildning 2020(13).xlsx'
<class 'FileNotFoundError'>
<traceback object at 0x03E25A30>

Have tried to troubleshoot this using Windows resource Monitor with 2 cases, but there seems to be no application holding a lock on their document. 

Steps to reproduce
1. Document app On
2. Choose to Edit an MS Office document
3. Try to save it.
4. You might get the mentioned error. 

Expected behavior:
No "upload failed" message. 

OS: Any
Browser and version: Any

Can support reproduce? No

Workaround? Yes
Describe workaround: Make sure you save the document to your desktop before you exit your document, and then upload it manually as a new version. Otherwise, the document will be lost. 

See attached log file and pictures.
title: Copy of CC: Watson - 'Upload failed'
(iOS) Create Idea with SyncObject

Reported by: rose-mari.johansson@inera.se
EE Account: Sveriges Kommuner och Regioner (SKR) (PP Account ID: 168443315)
Case or Chat ID: 00299393

If you restore a subfolder where the parent folder has been permanently deleted, then the restored subfolder is placed at the root level in the document tool. Compared to Windows, Windows rebuilds the missing folder path and restores the subfolder to the correct location. Linux Mint asks if you want to restore the folder path.

I do not know about MacOS, but I think we should try to mimic the same restore behavior of the recycle bin?


Steps to reproduce
1. Delete a subfolder from the document tool
2. Delete the parent folder from the document tool
3. Permanently delete the parent folder form the recycle bin
4. Restore the subfolder from the recycle bin; the folder will be restored to the root level in the document tool instead of the restore path being recreated. 


Expected behavior:
Should rebuild the folder path when restored from the recycle bin.

OS: Any
Browser and version: Any

Can support reproduce? Yes

Workaround? No 
Describe workaround:
title: CC: Recycle bin - Restores to root level if parent folder is permanently deleted

Per Erik Lundberg: The cause of the issue is that the user account is stored in the Swedish datacenter while the company account is located in the US. description:
________________________________
From: Dropbox <api-support@dropbox.com>
Sent: 21 November 2020 01:11
To: projectplace.dev@gmail.com <projectplace.dev@gmail.com>
Subject: Important Dropbox API Updates

[https://cfl.dropboxstatic.com/static/images/emails/dbx_masthead_default.png]
Hi Projectplace,
We released an update to our authorization model—you’ll want to review your app’s (Projectplace File Picker, Projectplace Mobile App) permission settings, and may need to update your code for refresh tokens.
Action Required: Token and Permission Updates

The Dropbox API now supports OAuth scopes, PKCE, refresh tokens, and short-lived access tokens. We’re asking developers to review their app’s permission settings and ensure their apps support short-lived access tokens. Apps that require background access will need to update to use refresh tokens, which is made easier by using our updated SDKs<https://www.dropbox.com/l/AAAQtThsoJovz7fTO-EoQhbhxBA_3vqc84I>.

Starting September 30th, 2021, the Dropbox OAuth flow will no longer return long-lived access tokens. It will instead return short-lived access tokens, and optionally return refresh tokens. Please be sure to review, test, and move to the new permission model before then.

For detailed instructions, please see:
- Dropbox OAuth Guide<https://www.dropbox.com/l/AABFpwiWB_wNzybZkz0pFK3rcLdCqh8TDBY>
- Blog post — Now Available: OAuth Scopes and Enhanced Permissions<https://dropbox.tech/developers/now-available--scoped-apps-and-enhanced-permissions>
- Blog post — Migrating App Permissions and Access Tokens<https://dropbox.tech/developers/migrating-app-permissions-and-access-tokens>

Platform Updates

As you review these changes, be sure to check out the latest additions to the Dropbox platform released this year. These don’t require action, but they may enrich your application and increase the value for your users. Some of these include, but aren't limited to:

•       Extensions<https://www.dropbox.com/l/AADKWCtrF37VVI2AAAsxDAzBXX5aJOp7O5Y> — These enable your users to launch your app from the Dropbox website.
•       Embedder<https://www.dropbox.com/l/AAB9ZR7WFi60vpMgFvzYEFHuDwhJ7hPgucE> — This new component allows you to easily render rich Dropbox previews on your web site.
•       Paper<https://aem.dropbox.com/en-us/lp/developers/reference/paper-migration-guide> — Dropbox Paper docs are now accessible through the file APIs, rather than separate calls.
•       Developer Guides<https://www.dropbox.com/l/AABcSVXIo6R9qEYdKZw3XgM3iKa9mS1d_qQ> — These new guides are the best resource for learning all the Dropbox API has to offer.
Our recently revamped Dropbox Developer Blog<https://dropbox.tech/developers> is the best place to find developer feature announcements, tutorials, and resources. If you have any questions, visit our developer forum<https://www.dropboxforum.com/t5/Dropbox-API-Support-Feedback/bd-p/101000014> or submit a ticket<https://www.dropbox.com/l/AACi8wGhZM69gHRoFkD2B6p1CXBNaKDBEGQ>.
Thanks!
- Dropbox Platform Team
Dropbox, Inc.
PO Box 77767, San Francisco, CA 94107
View Privacy Policy<https://www.dropbox.com/l/AADDKo7kJ8t9bA2Ijn2yI7Axxeb5Gz__k3A/privacy#privacy> | Unsubscribe<https://www.dropbox.com/l/AAD8pD9g7wpBRvvllDLmyv58eVNLMM3Eqrk>
title: Fw: Important Dropbox API Updates

Reported by: rose-mari.johansson@inera.se
EE Account: Sveriges Kommuner och Regioner (SKR) (PP Account ID: 168443315)
Case or Chat ID: 00299393

Restored subfolders and files are not visible unless you restore the deleted parent folders as well. 

If you permanently delete the parent folder from the recycle bin, the restored subfolder will never reappear again.

If you permanently delete the parent folder from the recycle bin, and then restore the sub folder, then the sub folder will be moved to root level in the document tool.

Steps to reproduce
1. Create subfolder with content in the document tool.
2. Delete the subfolder
3. Delete the parent folder
4. Restore the sub folder: it appears to not be restored, but will reappear if you restore the parent folder as well. -if the parent folder has not been permanently deleted.  

Expected behavior:
Do as in Windows: If the restore path is missing, recreate the file/folder path and add the restored documents to the restored sub folder. 

Also, add an extra column in the recycle bin showing the file path from where it was deleted from, just as in Windows Recycle bin.

OS: Any
Browser and version: Any

Can support reproduce? Yes

Workaround? No 
Describe workaround:

See attached screen recording.
title: Copy of CC: Documents - Restored items not visible if parent folder is deleted afterward

description:
INTERAL

Enforced SSO causes a problem when the user needs to change the email address, e.g. due to marriage and has a new last name. They can no longer login to add new email, and if SSO is enforced/provisioning is enabled, a new profile might be created as well. 

Current workaround we have, that really breaks the SSO security:
 * Ask CCOPS to add the new email address to the profile.
* Move the user out from the account, so that the user can login using pwd. This option is not used.
* The PPSA user profile option "Prompt user(s) to add new secondary address" does not help either, as the user needs to login using SSO.
... none of the options above won't work or works around the SSO security. 

Expected behavior:
In other products like PPM Pro, a manager can change the user details so that the user can login to PPM Pro again. description:
Reported by: rajesh.nathan@cnoinc.com
EE Account: CNO Services, LLC (PP Account ID: 1359413462)
Case or Chat ID: 00330612

/issue description/
There is an issue where a user receives an error (""General Failure trying to connect Projectplace with Innotas. Please contact support." ) when trying to access time reporting in Projectplace. They should be taken to PPM Pro, but instead, they receive an error. After speaking with Jon High and Daniel O'Dell, they determined that the user is receiving the error because the email address in PP and PPM Pro do not match as the integration is case sensitive.

Their email in PPM Pro is Rajesh.Nathan@CNOinc.com, and in PPSA it's lowercase: rajesh.nathan@cnoinc.com

They are unable to update the email address in PPM Pro as it is updated via a feed from Workday. When they try to update it in PP, it tells them that the ID already exists. 

I opened a PPCCOPS case (00331189) to have the email address updated on the backend but was informed that they are unable to do so. 

I then opened a case for PPM Pro (00331591) and they updated the email address to all lowercase letters. I asked the customer to test again and they still received the error.

Daniel O'Dell then toggled Team Member+ and Is Plan Enabled off and on again and this did still not resolve the issue

Per Jon High: "it feels like this is something that might need to be fixed on the Projectplace side, in general. The team member+ timesheet seems to be case sensitive, which is a bug in my mind."

Per Robert Henriksen:  "I would guess this could in code be worked around by forcing the letters in email adr to be lower case letters in the communication between PP <-> PPM Pro?"

Steps to reproduce
1. In an account with the PPM Pro to PP integration enabled, create a user profile in PP with all lowercase letters and then create a user profile in PPM Pro with the same email address but with capital letters.
2. Try accessing time reporting from PP
3. Error message received

Expected behavior:
If the email address exists in both PPM Pro and PP, Time reporting in PP should take them to PPM Pro without any issues. (case sensitivity should not be an issue if the emails match)

OS:
Browser and version:

Can support reproduce? was confirmed by Jon High

Workaround? Yes
Describe workaround: Access time reporting through PPM Pro instead of PP

Add print screens/videos to your card
Add trace when applicable
Add comment and tag **CC Issues**
title: Copy of CC: Integration - Email address for integration is case sensitive - causes error for user when the email addresses do not match exactly (capital letters vs lowercase letters)

description:
INTERNAL

This customer reported a card sorting order that is not working as expected. Due to this, I spotted an odd 7-days trace in the user profile:

chrisae@mekservice.no
https://ppsa.projectplace.com/ppadmin/admin.cgi/0/922428351?op=userdetails

 Trace:

https://ppsa.projectplace.com/ppadmin/admin.cgi/0/1?op=show_logs&q=USER.keyword:chrisae@mekservice.no,tags:traceback&index=logstash-2020.06.17,logstash-2020.06.18,logstash-2020.06.19,logstash-2020.06.20,logstash-2020.06.21,logstash-2020.06.22,logstash-2020.06.23&timeperiod=last%207d

Erik Lundberg wrote:
_This is a bug caused by inconsistent data. The API that the user is calling is trying to fetch attributes for a number of workspaces, among them the storage limit. At least one of the workspaces are deleted, so when the API is trying to look at the attributes, there is nothing to be found, and an error occurs._

​_If it's urgent we could do a workaround, but I believe it's better that the responsible team (iTeam, I believe?) takes a look at it, both for their awareness and that they probably has a better idea of the best way of resolving the issue._

_When reaching out to iTeam, please include this URL: https://sentry.projectplace.com/sentry/main-service/issues/184794/. It links to the issue in our technical issue management system, Sentry, and contains additional information that will help the developers to fix it quicker._

* Update from Erik; he thinks this should be moved to Boards swimlane *

2....
3....

Expected behavior:
